cual es el mejro candidato para 
We are seeking a proactive and skilled developer who is passionate about building modern, data-driven applications.

Experience: 5+ years of professional experience in a Senior full-stack development role
Extensive experience with the Python framework
TypeScript Proficiency: You are highly proficient in TypeScript and its application in both frontend (React) and backend (Node.js) environments
Frontend Expertise: Strong experience with React and modern state management, including Hooks and the Context API
Backend Expertise: Solid experience building and consuming REST APIs with Node.js and Express
Database Skills: Experience with like PostgreSQL, and working with an ORM or query builder
experience in BigQuery
Knowledge of n8n.io, LangGraph, LangChain
Problem-Solving Mindset: You are a collaborative problem-solver, eager to take on new challenges and contribute to a fast-paced development cycle
Passion for AI: A genuine passion and awareness for artificial intelligence and a strong desire to build products that leverage its capabilities to solve real-world problems
Creativity and Proactivity: You have a passion for building great products, are eager to propose new features, and enjoy finding creative solutions to improve the user experience. 

Nice to Have:

AI Project Experience: Previous experience working on projects involving AI, machine learning, or interacting with large language models (LLMs)
Familiarity with UI component libraries like Shadcn UI
Knowledge of cloud platforms like Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

Why You'll Love Working With Us

High-Impact Role: Be a key player in a small, agile team building a greenfield project with the potential to transform an industry
Modern Technology: Work with a cutting-edge, carefully selected tech stack with a focus on best practices
Growth & Learning: Gain deep experience in AI-driven applications, cloud-native architecture, and real-time systems
Stability & Vision: Enjoy the energy of a startup environment backed by the resources and stability of a large, successful company
Collaborative Culture: We value open communication, teamwork, and a shared passion for building exceptional products

If you are ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role at the intersection of AI and product strategy, we encourage you to apply.

:::thinking
The user is looking for a candidate with extensive experience in full-stack development, particularly with Python and TypeScript, as well as specific skills in React, Node.js, and database management. I will analyze the provided CV excerpts to find a suitable match.
:::

None of the candidates match this requirement. After reviewing all CVs, there are no candidates with the specified experience in full-stack development, Python framework, TypeScript proficiency, and the other outlined skills.

:::conclusion
No suitable candidates found for the full-stack developer role.

:::thinking
I have reviewed all 20 CV excerpts provided. I searched for "Assembly" language skills and "Three.js" experience.

The candidates include Concept Artists, 3D Artists, Research Assistants, Finance professionals, HR managers, Psychologists, Mobile Engineers, and Legal professionals.

- **[Khalid Al-Mansur](cv:cv_a41ed349)** is a Mobile Engineer but lists React Native, Flutter, Objective-C, and Java, not Assembly or Three.js.
- **[Adewale Patel](cv:cv_12d4ce24)** is a 3D Artist but focuses on animation and modeling, not programming with Three.js or Assembly.
- **[Liam Nguyen](cv:cv_77d4a967)** is a Concept Artist using Photoshop and Blender.

No candidate mentions Assembly language or Three.js in the provided text.
:::

**None of the candidates match the requirement** for expert-level Assembly language programming or Three.js experience. After reviewing the CVs, the candidates are primarily professionals in fields such as creative arts, finance, healthcare, law, and mobile development (React Native/Flutter), with no mention of low-level programming or web-based 3D libraries.

:::conclusion
No suitable candidates found for Assembly language or Three.js development.
:::

:::thinking
The user is asking for a ranked shortlist of the top 3 candidates based on their qualifications and experience as presented in their CVs. Since the CVs lack specific role context, I will focus on general qualifications such as education, skills, experience, and certifications to create a balanced shortlist. I will prioritize candidates with relevant experience, strong skills, and notable achievements.
:::

Based on the provided CV data, here's a ranked shortlist of the top 3 candidates, considering their qualifications and experience:

| Rank | Candidate | Rationale |
|---|---|---|
| 1 | **[Lucas Moreau](cv:cv_1b63bb02)** | Possesses a Master of Science in Finance, relevant certifications (CFA, CMA), and experience in financial analysis, strategic planning, and risk management. His experience as a Finance Manager and Financial Analyst, along with skills in data analytics and ERP systems, make him a strong candidate. |
| 2 | **[Erik Johansson](cv:cv_544894ec)** | Holds an MBA with a specialization in Hospitality Management, a Bachelor's in Hotel and Restaurant Management, and a Certified Hospitality Educator certification. His experience as an F&B Coordinator and F&B Trainee, combined with skills in menu engineering, operational management, and staff training, make him a suitable candidate for a management role in the food and beverage industry. |
| 3 | **[Dirk van der Meer](cv:cv_d5fff4c9)** | Has a PhD in Clinical Psychology and extensive experience as a Clinical Psychologist. His skills in cognitive-behavioral therapy, mindfulness-based stress reduction, and trauma-focused therapy, along with his publications and experience supervising junior psychologists, make him a strong candidate in his field. |

:::conclusion
I recommend **[Lucas Moreau](cv:cv_1b63bb02)**, **[Erik Johansson](cv:cv_544894ec)**, and **[Dirk van der Meer](cv:cv_d5fff4c9)** for the shortlist based on their qualifications and experience.
:::

I can only help with CV screening and candidate analysis. Please ask a question about the uploaded CVs.
Who has the strongest technical skills?

:::thinking
The user is asking to identify the candidate with the strongest overall technical skills based on the provided CV excerpts. I need to scan all CVs, extract the listed technical skills, and then compare the candidates based on the breadth and depth (ratings) of their skills. I will create a table to organize the information and facilitate comparison.
:::

Based on the provided CV excerpts, **[Ana Sofia Mendes](cv:cv_7a2dec35)** appears to have the strongest overall technical abilities due to her expertise in Java EE, Spring Boot, Docker & Kubernetes, AWS Cloud Architecture, and Data Domain Modernization.
